name: Project Y
description:
Description :

It's free, multiplayer, coop based, survival, first - person game where You are attacked by zombies. Your objective is survive as long as you can...If You can do that.

Game features (It's just early access) :

  • Simple menu with graphics options
  • Beautiful low poly stylized graphics
  • Basic items (such as knifes, axes)
  • Some props (Crates, barrels)
  • Basic player equipment
  • And of course zombies
  • And much much more (cooming soon)

Other Info About Project :

  • You can join to discord server to report some bugs, giving ideas or what You want.
  • Coop max to 10 players

Social Media :

Project Y Discord Server : https://discord.gg/HtwWTkat4u
